short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn from Netflix, YouTube, local videos, any website, ebooks, and more. By language learners for language learners.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⚠️ Google Chrome has deprecated "Manifest v2", which is what this Legacy extension was build upon. But don't worry, there's a new Migaku extension! Check it out:
🔗 https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/migaku-learn-languages/lkhiljgmbeecmljiogckofcalncmfnfo

It features a brand new design, greatly improved ease-of-use, some new features, and is being constantly updated with new features and fixes every couple weeks. It is the official successor to "Migaku - Legacy", and the team is working hard on all the same features and more.

🧑‍🧑‍🧒‍🧒 We also have a community Discord! 🔗 https://discord.gg/zkm3a867
In there you can see announcements, chat with other users, get support, and interact with the team directly. The team is very active there, and your feedback and reports are important to us!

All the best with your language learning journey!
- ❤️‍🔥 The team at Migaku

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"Migaku - Legacy" description

🎥 Learn vocabulary naturally by watching Netflix and YouTube, or directly from local video files on your computer

📖 Read websites and ebooks. Import any webpage and save it to read later using our reader

💪 TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
Keep track of the number of words you really know

👂 NATIVE AUDIO
Play native audio while reading with one click

🚀 DICTIONARY LOOKUPS
Instant lookups for any word. Support for bilingual and monolingual dictionaries!

✨ INSTANT ANKI FLASHCARDS
Instantly create flashcards that include a screenshot and audio from the content you are watching, and automatically adds definitions.

🎯 REAL-WORLD VOCABULARY
See the frequency of any word at a glance

🤘 DUAL SUBTITLES
Have subtitles in your target language and your native language on screen at the same time

You can use Migaku with the following languages:
● Cantonese
● English
● French
● German
● Japanese
● Korean
● Mandarin
● Portuguese
● Spanish

Migaku can actually do A LOT MORE than just this, so be sure to check out our website, and the trailer above to see it in action.

Migaku requires an account to use. Sign up and give us a try for free at Migaku.com!
